ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Selo's Consonant Chain
ygData.msgSnippet: This is the same question I wanted to ask the list today.  I was in frenzied last night and I got a ton of very early wear-off messages on this song.  I was
ygData.messageBody:
This is the same question I wanted to ask the list today. I was in
frenzied last night and I got a ton of very early wear-off messages on
this song. I was wondering whether I had found a sour spot in my
twisting cycle (e.g., I was twisting just fast enough to get the song
starts/song stops problem) or if this was a problem with Chains itself.
At my level, the stuff we were fighting is mostly normal blue. The song
ought to work pretty well.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 47 songs, Innoruuk


Adam Wasserman wrote:
>
> Hey,
>
> Now that we are getting messages when our song effects wear off, I've
> noticed that our snare song amost never lasts the full duration. Many times
> it wears off as soon as I finish singing it.
>
> I was wondering if any of you were having the same problem and whether or
> not this is by design or a bug that we should bring to the attention of the
> powers that be.
>
> Draelon
